gameDetails.name: The 7th Continent: Forgotten Passages
gameDetails.description:
New characters, new states and skills, alternative cards for terrains, events, items, states, food, etc. You thought you’d seen it all? Think again!

—description from the publisher

This expansion includes many of the stretch goals that were originally included in the "What Goes Up, Must Come Down" expansion's Kickstarter campaign. You do not need this expansion if you already have the What Goes Up, Must Come Down (white box) from the Kickstarter campaign.
